data.text: i’m not trying to start shit with anybody over this so if you try to start shit, you’ll get blocked xoxo

just to be clear, i’m NOT saying that what he was accused of doing is okay! i’m just saying that if he HAD done that, that it’s his business and NOT ours. but he has already spoken up about it to someone and said it’s false.
@idleherron So sending nudes to underage girls okay

and no i’m not a fucking cupcake. i’m just speaking the facts. if it turns out to be true, okay, good for him. but at this point idgaf. Tyler is his own person and he can do whatever tf he wants and make his own decisions.
